WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 60+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description: when i am building an upgrade list and export it to lootplan, it imports my already existing itmes to loot plan, too.
WorkItem.Summary: building upgrade list and export to lootplan

Comments.Message:
Edit (sorry for my bad english)
If i am building an upgrade list and export it to lootplan, it imports my already existing itmes to loot plan, too.
That would suggest that your current set is not optimal you can get with your current items.
